1.content:
Today is the first official day of summer, and you are finally done school! After months of endless math tests and assignments, you have finished and have the summer to plan outings with friends, discuss the latest news, and spend time with family. It's quite exciting, but you know you only have 2 months to make it last before school comes around the corner yet again, catapulting you back into the normal, boring life you live.

You wake up around noon, and log onto your computer to check your Facebook and Twitter, seeing what's going on for the day! As you sign into both of these sites, a message pops up saying that your accounts did not exist, and to please contact the site administrators for more information. Confused, you shoot off an email to both sites, and then go to get dressed. You slide on your Vans skate shoes, boardshorts and a t shirt, before heading downstairs to get something to eat. Nobody seems to be home, and you realize your parents are out getting groceries, as per a note left behind. You grab an apple and a bottle of Mountain Dew and head to the front door to walk up to the store, but as soon as you open it, there is someone standing there. You barely have a second to utter the word "Bieber?" before you are knocked over the head and fall into a world of darkness.
1.title: Time for Summer!

11.content:
Your head is spinning as you wake up, noticing a rank smell in the air, and how everything around you is dark. You start to move, bouncing around in the place you are in, making you wonder what the heck is going on. The ground below you is moist, and the smell of sweat lingers in the air like an unimaginable stink. That's when you are hit in the side by something weird, and you fly down onto your side, falling beside a small hole which light is coming out of. You peer out of it, and scream as you realize this isn't just an abduction, as you see other shoes outside. You have been shrunk and are trapped inside a shoe! "Yo Ryan my man, how're you! Wanna come down to Los Angeles next week for some fun? I got some new games and stuff we can entertain ourselves with" you hear above. That's when you remember it was Justin Bieber at the door when you were shrunk, and you must be inside of his rank sneakers!

Justin finishes his phone call and continues walking for what seems like forever before he stops. Light pours into the entering of the shoe as he slips them off, and a hand reaches inside. You run to the end of the shoe, but it catches you before you can run more than a few centimetres. The hand pulls you out, and you are blinded by the light after being in such a dark atmosphere for so long. "Yo you little piece of shit" Justin says to you, as his face appears when your eyes adapt to the new light. "Welcome to your new life, being even more pathetic than you were before. You now belong to me, and will be my slave, doing whatever I want. Your purpose is to make my athletic, busy ass life easier, fulfilling any need I may have. To start I want you to get down and worship me.

What does Justin make you worship first of his?
11.title: You wake up..

info.brief_description: This story follows your life being Justin Bieber's shrunken little slave.
info.description:
Welcome to my story about Justin Bieber shrinking YOU, and making you his little servant. This story has the following rules for additions:

Please use proper grammar and spell words properly, so that the addition you make is legible.
Please refrain from adding any chapters with gay love in them, such as "he passionately makes out with you"
No girls are to be added to this story.
Additional characters such as a friend of Justin's may be added, but please keep them as a minor character, and not one that takes over most of the story.
Subscribe if you would like to get updates from the story, as it will be updated often.

Have fun reading and I hope you enjoy! Please send me any comments you may have about the story and be prepared to be launched into a world, one where you are owned by an arrogant, world-capturing teenager by the name of Justin Bieber.
